outputs.output_descr: To address sedimentation in the Lake's inflowing rivers by devising and implementing cross-sectoral measures to limit soil erosion and seek deforestation through promotion of: Natural resource management practices that increase productivity and resource conservation; Entrepreneurial skills for productive alternative income generating activities to reduce pressures on land resources; Local governance structures for sustainable natural resource management in local communities.

project_descr: Lake Tanganyika Integrated Management Project - Zambia Component
